channel.title: 4 glitches... Help me
channel.description:
anyone got codes to make u need 99 to wear skill capes?
cape (t), cape, and hood plawks :]
also sometimes when i eat food it doesn't heal, like if u eat once some1 atks u, it wont heal, so ppl are eating there food but its not healing them, anyone got a fix for that?
also i saw a tut on how 2 fix x-logging glitch in the show-off section, he sez wat 2 replace but it says logout delay int not found, i put in there, still not found...
last but not least how i make a npc have a dieing emote, im trying 2 fix dark beasts death emote since it kinda looks gay when they die atm......
etc etc help if u no how 2 fix any
[SPOILER]rep++ 2 helpers lol[/spoiler]

item.title: 4 glitches... Help me
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

Something like this for the eating?

if (healing[2] == 20 || healing[2] == 24 || healing[2] == 16 && healing[3] == -1 || healing[2] == 12 || healing[2] == 3) { sendMsg("It heals some health."); }

case 391: if (playerLevel[3] >= 1 && healTimer <= 0) { healing[1] = 24; healing[2] = 24; healing[3] = -1; healTimer = 4; sendMsg("You eat the manta ray."); } break;

Read full topic
